Perfect rip, absolutely astounding level of quality for a meager 663MB.
Thanks RiddlerA, I hope you keep it up.

As for the movie, I cannot understand why it has such a high rating on IMDB, there is nothing visionary or unexpected in it.
In fact I think it would been too kind to say that it's hedged in by cliches - it down right drowning in them.

Some movies are immortal, timeless, ageless. Relevant beyond their time.
"12 Monkeys" is not one of them.

If you were as disappointed with this movie as I was, then try this movie instead:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4995602/Gattaca.1997.BRRip.x264.AC3%5B5.1%5D-VLiS

Made only two years later than this feature, Gattaca still stands tall as one of sci-fi's greatest.
Thanks very much.
